title: League of Legends - Community Events

embed.description: Â© 2016 Riot Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Riot Games, League of Legends and PvP.net are trademarks, services marks, or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc.

body:
Hiya all, if anyone is interesting in joining a tourney feel free to check this one out!

GENERAL INFORMATION:

Date: Sunday 6th March 2016
Start Time: 3:00PM (AEDT)
Run Time: Until all matches have been completed
Tournament Mode: Double Elimination
Chatroom: fivevfive
Chatroom Check In: Between 2:00PM - 3:00PM AEDT (Only one representative of the team is required)
Max no. of teams : 16
Seeding: Random

To Register:

If you are part of a team interested in playing, follow these steps:
EVERY PLAYER MUST understand and abide by the above rules and the official rules.
THE REPRESENTATIVE/CAPTAIN must register their team to the bracket on Challonge. Within the description box (found in settings) they must write the summoner names and positions of every team member and up to three substitutes. Rosters may be changed up until your first match starts. http://challonge.com/tournaments/signup/7JN0dPbDCp
THE REPRESENTATIVE/CAPTAIN must add Skyous in game to have a direct point of contact for when they have questions. Players and coaches should feel free to add organizers but they must direct all questions to the captain.
Show up on the day and play.

Prizing Provided by Riot:

FIRST PLACE INDIVIDUALS
1000 RP, Ryze, Triumphant Ryze, 4-Win IP Boost
SECOND PLACE INDIVIDUALS–EIGHTH PLACE INDIVIDUALS
4-Win IP Boost

Credits to Nijiiyo for his Registration and Code of Conduct setup
